com.dhemery.core
Interface Feature<S,F>

Type Parameters:
S - The type of subject that has the feature
F - The type of feature
All Known Implementing Classes:
BooleanValue, ByteValue, CharacterValue, DoubleValue, FloatValue, IntegerValue, LongValue, NamedFeature, PresentFeature, Self, ShortValue, VisibleFeature
public interface Feature<S,F>

Retrieves the value of a feature for a subject.

Method Summary
 F of(S subject)
          Return the subject's current value for the feature.
 

Method Detail

of
